import React, { useState } from 'react' import{ Box,Button, Alert} from '@mui/materials' import './LoginSignup.css' import user_icon from '../assets/person.png' import email_icon from '../assets/email.png' import password_icon from '../assets/password.png' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import Chatabot from '../chatbot/Chatabot' const LoginSignup = () => { const [action, setAction] = useState("Login"); const navigate=useNavigate(); const [registerUser, {isloading}]=useRegisterUser return ( <>
{action}
{action === "Login" ?
:
}
{action === "Sign Up" ?
:
Lost Password? Click Here!
}
{ setAction("Sign Up") }}> Sign Up
{ setAction("Login") }}>Login
 ) } export default LoginSignup
